item.title: %%%%Fixing testscape Commands%%%%
item.dc:creator: @mumakilspawn mumakilspawn
item.description:
@mumakilspawn wrote:

Difficulty: 4/10
Purpose: To fix the bug on testscape commands.
Search:.1/*END OF FRAME TESTING*/From end of frame testing and redphat code, replace everything with the code on 1.1else if (command.startsWith("redphat")) { addItem(1038,1); }1.11
1.1[code]/END OF FRAME TESTING/

else if (command.startsWith(“testclue96f3t23t43v4g3”))
{
cluereward(4151, 1434, 3140, 4087, 1050, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1);
showInterface(8134);
}
else if (command.startsWith(“wowz”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“x91”))
{
int id = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));
//stillgfx(id, absY, absX);
sendMessage(“Testing GrApHiCs cODE!!”);
}

else if (command.startsWith(“loadclue”))
{
//loadmoreinfo();
println_debug("cluelevel: "+cluelevel);
println_debug("cluestage: "+cluestage);
println_debug("clueid: "+clueid);
}

else if (command.startsWith(“male”))
{
sendMessage(“You’re now a man…”);
pHead=1;
pBeard=10;
pTorso=18;
pArms=26;
pHands=33;
pLegs=36;
pFeet=42;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if (command.startsWith(“female”))
{
sendMessage(“You’re now a girl…”);
pHead=50;
pTorso=57;
pArms=62;
pHands=68;
pLegs=72;
pFeet=80;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

else if (command.startsWith("empty"))
{
	removeAllItems();
}

else if (command.startsWith("prayguild"))
 {
 if(absY >= 3672 && absY <= 3970) 
 {
 sendMessage("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness.");
 }
 else if (absY <= 3672)
{
            heightLevel = 1;
            teleportToX = 3051;
	teleportToY = 3497;
}
 else if (absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970)
{
            heightLevel = 1;
            teleportToX = 3051;
	teleportToY = 3497;
}
 else if (absY >= 10112)
 {
 sendMessage("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness.");
 }
 }
else if (command.startsWith("tools"))
{

man female empty prayguild tools raisepray smithgold magic barrows farm1 pimp1 pimp2 pimp3 infinity godequipment notedbarrows archer arrows dragon basicrunes cbrunes ahrim dharock guthan kharil torag verac saradomin zamorak guthix phats masks drops bluephat greenphat purplephat redphat NOTE IF THESE DONT WORK, EITHER UR CASES ARE MISSPLACED DUE TO IF YOU TRY mystats WEILD A GADDER HAMMER, FIX UR CASES. recovery crystalchest wildmine kalphqueen kingbd abbydemons chaoselem smelt

Some of these commands, gives item, restore stats, and teleports like ::kingbd.
All of these codes starts with ::.
Some of these codes dont work for some, reason; like cbrune it was suppose to give u basice rune or something, but you cant get it cuz you have to be a player rights 2. So i deleted the player rights 2. Now it should work. If it still doesnt work, you need to fix the item thing, look below,
Code:
else if (command.startsWith("basicrunes")) { addItem(554,1000000); addItem(555,1000000); addItem(556,1000000); addItem(557,1000000);See whats wrong with it? the 554, should be 0554. SO change it, add zeros. Now it should work. If other commands still doesnt work, open up moparscape, go to item id’s. Search for what ever the item it is like zammy leg, its 2655 (that is 1 item)
It should be 2656 (for the multi like 100k zammy legs) Same as others. OR if the command is 1 item, you can delete the ,1 and leave it like that.
Or the easy way, make your self an admin or mod to get these runes.
[size=15pt]Some[/size]of these codes dont work, because of your cases. Fix your cases or add a new case inorder for these things to work.

Read full topic
